title: "Bank Danych Lokalnych API wrapper"

Recently I have been working on API wrapper for Bank Danych Lokalnych.\
It's Polish state service when you can find many interesting statistical data for\
different territorial levels.

You can find a R package here [BDL](https://github.com/krystiankorzec/bdl)
